pages.text: $(li)Shelves are a new kind of decorative block used to hold $(l:patchouli:decoration/inspirations/books)Books$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can place books and remove books from the shelf by right clicking, or shift right clicking with an empty hand to open the GUI.
pages.title: Shelves
Shelves variants
pages.text: $(li)Default: randomly sized books which take on the color of the current book in the slot.$(br)$(li)Rainbow: book colors from red to purple in order$(br)$(li)Tomes: consistent, brown books of the same size$(br)$(li)Ancient: brown and tan books with an adventuring theme
